committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: A bill to amend the urban development action grant program with respect to determining the level of physical and economic distress of certain urban counties.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, if so requested by an urban county, to exclude areas of such county consolidated with a city having a population of over 100,000 from determinations of distress levels for purposes of the urban development action grant program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the urban development action grant program with respect to determining the level of physical and economic distress of certain urban counties.
